channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Quick Subscribe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Quick Subscribe

item.title: CVE-2022-1792|2024-08-03T00:16:59.933Z -- unknown -- quick%20subscribe
item.description: The Quick Subscribe WordPress plugin through 1.7.1 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack and leading to Stored XSS due to the lack of sanitisation and escaping in some of them
